Devil's Isle Survivor:
Chaos... That's right. That's the best word I can use to describe it...
It was like something ripped a hole in reality itself. Both captain and crew were sucked in...
I later heared that power is called Kamaloka or Pailaka or somesuch. They say that it will engulf the entire world.
That's when my nightmares came... Soon after closing my eyes, I dream of strenge and horrible monsters who forture me until I wake again. Ah, but the real problem was something else... Do you know what it is?
Ask him to tell you.
